PersonalInformation.Title: Personal Information
PersonalInformation.Text: ROSEFIELD watches collects all the personal information you provide us with during registration and/or completing your order. All your personal information is treated confidentially and in accordance with privacy regulations recorded in the Wet Bescherming Persoonsgegevens (the Dutch Personal Data Protection Act). We only use your personal information in order to complete your order(s), returns, exchanges, or to address any possible issues arising regarding the above mentioned.

Payments.Title: Payments
Payments.Text: Your payments are safely handled by a payment gateway provider. None of your sensitive information (i.e. credit cards details) is stored on our server.

ThirdParties.Title: Third Parties
ThirdParties.Text: None of your personal information is disclosed to third parties, except for cases when a third party is needed to fulfill your order or repair damaged product.

Cookies.Title: Cookies
Cookies.Text: Cookies are tracking devices helping users to navigate through websites more efficiently. Some cookies are essential for the website to function properly and they are helpful to the customers, as they remember their shopping cart and preferences.

NewsletterSubscription.Title: Newsletter Subscription
NewsletterSubscription.Text: You can unsubscribe at any time from receiving further email communications via the unsubscribe link located at the bottom of every email.
